name: Synthrally
description: Synthrally is a local multiplayer arcade sports game with simple, fast-paced action. Choose from an array of selectable classes, map variants, and alternate play modes to mix things up and keep gameplay exciting!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista / 7 Processor: 2.5 GHz Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 capable (256MB) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
